Wanderlust Festival Poncho

A woven poncho with a drawcord-adjustable waist.

This women's poncho was designed in collaboration with Wanderlust, the epic festival that merges music and wellness. The full-zip hooded poncho has snaps at the wrists so you can adjust the sleeve length. It comes with its own carry bag for easy packing and storage.
  • Side zip pockets
  • Full zip with drawcord-adjustable hood
  • Snap buttons at end of sleeves to customize sleeve length
  • Drawcord on back waist to adjust mid-section fit
  • Collapsible carry bag in left pocket for easy packing
  • Vertical 3-Stripes on back
  • Loose fit
  • 100% nylon plain weave
  • Imported

MADE FOR MINDFUL ADVENTURES

The adidas x Wanderlust collection gives you complete flexibility and comfort, allowing you to focus on your practice.
